nodes.text: The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life: The Nosaurians

The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life: The Nosaurians was an article in Star Wars Gamer 9 written by Craig Robert Carey and Daniel Wallace. It was illustrated by Darrell Riche. It features a characterization of the Nosaurian species and is presented from as a section from The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life by Professor Tem Eliss of the University of Sanbra.
